name: Dandelion (GhosteeGoo)
description:
This is interactive media. There are no choices, no time limits. Just enjoy the peace of a dandelion.

Controls: Use the left mouse button to blow on the dandelion to cause the puffy seeds to fly away. Be sure to make a wish as you do so.

I literally spent 12 hours on this and I am so proud that I actually got something done for the first time in my life.
